name: Block Finder
author: Troy Chaplin

sections.description: Adds a dashboard metabox that allows a user to quickly find and edit specific core or custom blocks across all post types on a site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

  1. Once activated head to the dashboard
  2. Look for the “Block Finder” item
  3. Select your post type and block
  4. Click “Find Block”

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.

short_description: Easily find content blocks anywhere on your site.
description: Adds a dashboard metabox that allows a user to quickly find and edit specific core or custom blocks across all post types on a site.
